# as_run_dir

## Extract run directory from an object

## Description
Extract run directory from an object 


## Usage
```r
as_run_dir(x) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| x | Object to extract run directory from |



## Value
Run directory path(s)
